data.name: Lost Souls
data.detailed_description:
Lost Souls takes you and your friends on an epic adventure!

In single player mode, you can test yourself by passing the most difficult tests:
Gather supplies - craft powerful weapons to fight against various opponents.
- build a temporary shelter to take a breath from the huge number of deaths.

Explore the dungeon - study each level carefully, as you may miss something valuable.
- before studying the level, I recommend storing the extracted loot in the chest

Fight monsters - each enemy has its own unique characteristics and loot
- with each level, the enemy is smarter and more dangerous: come up with different tactics

Skills - Become a tank with a lot of health and stone skin
- Become a magician with a different number of abilities and destroy hordes of enemies with one glance.
- Get a lot of resources with just one touch

Trade - There are many unique merchants who will gladly sell valuable items
- each merchant is unique

Treasures - Find mountains of gold to trade
- Somewhere in the dungeon you can find a unique weapon.
- The caches are full of different potions and resources.

Multiplayer
An open world with a lot of dungeons (but they still need to be found)
also waiting for you

  • beautiful Graphics

    [*unusual atmosphere[/h2]

      [*secret events[/h2]

      • interesting Dungeons

      • various Enemies & Bosses

      • various Treasure Caches

      And Much More

data.short_description: Lost Souls throws you and your friends on an epic adventure! Alone or together, players fight, explore secret dungeons to survive on an unknown and dangerous island!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7.8.10
  • Processor: Quad-cord Intel/AMD processor 2.3GHZ
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 560ti
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX 10 compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7.8.10
  • Processor: Quad-cord Intel/AMD processor 3.2GHZ
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1050ti
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX 10 compatible
